website_summaries.verdict: Allergy sufferers will love the cleaning power and sealed dust containment technology this corded hand vac provides.
pros: Portable hand vacuum includes upholstery brush, 6-inch crevice tool, and dusting brush
Flexible hose makes it great for crevices, tight spaces and corners
cons: Be sure it's threaded correctly and screwed in like a jar lid

customer_reviews.title: That was a disappointment and for that reason it gets only three stars
customer_reviews.text: bought this as a replacement to the similar but earlier model that had worn out the internal plastic dirt chambers due to grit grinding on the plastic over time. This did not come with the hose extension as the earlier model had. That was a disappointment and for that reason it gets only three stars. Had it come with the hose extension it would have been either a four or maybe a five star review. Shark going cheap reduced the functionality of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Camper

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like that it came without a wand for the floor. I do like how it is light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Terry. L. Montang

customer_reviews.title: Handy light weight vac with plenty of power for its size
customer_reviews.text: Handy little vac. Sturdy and easy to tote around, use and empty out. Good suction for its size. Lighter weight than a gallon jug of milk. Generous cord length.
customer_reviews.author: E. J. Campfield

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SMALL VACUUM
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum is so good to have nearby! I use it to vacuum stairs, suction lint from my dryer vent, quick pickup of crumbs, etc, and whenever a small quick vacuuming job has to be done. I also have the Shark upright with the lift-away but because I have this little gem, I never remove the lift-away from the upright unless I’m cleaning it.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Kinchen

customer_reviews.title: Easily accesses hard to reach places
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an older Shark Lift-Around vacuum for the ease of portability and ability to reach otherwise inaccessible places that needed vacuuming. My only disappointment with the new model is the lack of an extendable portion hooked to the hose. I actually re-purposed the extension from my old lift-around by attaching it to the new vacuum unit so that I can use my new vacuum without having to kneel down or hurt my back by bending over too far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth ever penny.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd power pod. I use it for everything from vacuuming my cars to my dog. Yes my dog she loves it. It's lightweight enough to use on stairs. has great suction to clean out creaks and crevices.It's easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: alfrieda rose

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum, very portable, works great, pulls animal hair you didn't even know you had, out of the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Nosek

customer_reviews.title: I think it's a great product. It lives up to the Shark reputation
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with the light weight of the pod and the cleaning power, I think it's a great product. It lives up to the Shark reputation. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Shark has always made a great product in my opinion. Has great suction, is durable easy to empty and comes with a HEPA filter. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product, especially for pet hair on furniture & floor. Light weight enough.
customer_reviews.author: April Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!!!!! Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for in a portable vac. Its handy and has good suction!!! I would recommend highly. I do have to agree with others posting just needs the long wand to go along with it. This vac would make the perfect Christmas gift!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Glatter

customer_reviews.title: Get one, you won't be sorry : )
customer_reviews.text: Liked the most: the vacuum is easy to use, very powerful, and simply does the job I need done 100% for the money spent. I would recommend it to others, and would buy another one. Liked the least : nothing to mention. : )
customer_reviews.author: martin1985

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable unit.  Decided against battery models for more power
customer_reviews.text: Nice portable addition to our other shark upright. We have a cat who sheds like crazy. Also bought the pet attachment to help with that
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Very well item
customer_reviews.text: Comes in handy when I do not need too use big vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: So far the suction is plenty, light weight. ...
customer_reviews.text: So far the suction is plenty, light weight. My old one had an extension handle, this one does not come with any longer attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Guerrette

customer_reviews.title: easy to use lightweight perfect for small areas
customer_reviews.text: easy to use lightweight perfect for small areas, furniture, steps and vehicles
customer_reviews.author: LMK

customer_reviews.title: love this machine
customer_reviews.text: totally love this machine, light weight and great for stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Wiecek

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. But came missing the dusting tool. Trying to find out how to get it...
customer_reviews.author: PAULA SCHNEIDER

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Great to use, lite weight, cord length great. Great product
customer_reviews.author: TetsuoSotelo

customer_reviews.title: I love this little vacuum~best for all those hard to reach ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this little vacuum~best for all those hard to reach places but which attachment do you use on stairs?
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but needs an important attachment!
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum, it’s light and easy to carry around and use, easy to empty dust pan too. I had one before that lasted years and wanted to replace it, so the downside is this one doesn’t come with the extension tube for floor attachments. Luckily I saved the attachments so I don’t have to crawl around on the floor to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Anne

customer_reviews.title: A worth while 2nd vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: We have a nice upright vacuum, but, it is rather heavy to move up and down stairs, or outside to cars. Storage is a problem too. This one is very light, readily portable and powerful and takes up less space in the closet. I adapted tubes from a long gone canister vacuum, so that high, low or inaccessible places could be easily reached. The hose fitting(s) is larger in inside diameter than the usual standard vacuum cleaner hose, but, a little tape on the mating part of the accessory solves that problem easily, so, that you can use other vacuum accessories that you may have as well for even greater utillity.
customer_reviews.author: HammanFred

customer_reviews.title: I absolute love this little vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little vacuum cleaner. I wanted something to keep next to the litter box for quick, easy clean up and this is it. I LOVE IT. The power cord is very long and yes it’s true the hose isn’t very long but I don’t believe this is meant to replace a vacuum cleaner but is a better, more powerful alternative to a dust buster. It does everything I needed it to so I’m very happy with my purchase. In my opinion would also be great for cleaning wood trim and blinds.
customer_reviews.author: E.G.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the purpose
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my stairs...it's perfect for the job....I don't like how the attachments seem to come off too easily but I keep this at the bottom of the stairs...it's small enough to not be in the way and perfect for the job. It's nice and light.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Ari

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I like this vacuum. It doesn’t have batteries. Not sure why it wants me to rate the battery life. I should put one star but I don’t want to make the product look bad.
customer_reviews.author: gabba

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this to clean out computer systems. It works great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to clean out computer systems. It works great! Lots of power and keeps the dirt inside even with the filter so it doesn't get everywhere even though it is the consistency of talcum powder.
customer_reviews.author: Motorcycle Nut

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My darling wife and I bought this for the little chores around the house. Its main use is cleaning the pellet stove. It works very well. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Bill f

customer_reviews.title: VERY HAPPY with the suction
customer_reviews.text: VERY HAPPY with the suction, but the accessory for the floor is very small. Works great, by takes longer. I'm not complaining because this is not a vacuum meant to do a big floor. I just like the suction and portability so much, I would love to have a wider piece so I could use it more!
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Fasy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as powerful as expected - could also have better attachments.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The other Shark products that we have purchased nudged us into purchasing this hand held sweeper. It is top quality, works great and worth every penny that we paid for it. If you are looking for a small hand held vacuum you will not go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. McLafferty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small work
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to clean your narrow areas, staircase etc. Good Power and long cord help you extend it well. Working well for us.
customer_reviews.author: Vinay K

customer_reviews.title: I had an older one and my favorite little sweeper ever-I didn't think I'd find it again
customer_reviews.text: I had an older one and my favorite little sweeper ever-I didn't think I'd find it again. Same sweeper-updated look-great for woodwork and hard to reach areas and especially carpeted stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Great little vacuum. Lightweight with lots of suction power. Easy to empty. Very versatile. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J. Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: I like this sweeper
customer_reviews.text: I like this sweeper, however, I wish it had a retractable cord and a strap, other than that it works great and yes I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia H.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: To improve it ,one could add a long, non flexible hose extension to reach corners, trim, etc. high and low.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Vollmer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is just great.
customer_reviews.text: I think I am going to use this vacuum as long as it holds out. This thing is just great.
customer_reviews.author: chitown

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works as good as my other two Shark home vacs
customer_reviews.author: T. R. Poe

customer_reviews.title: Shark is the best dollar for dollar vacuum I ave ever found. A few better but way more expensive. Many not as good cost more.
customer_reviews.text: A great product at a great price. I own 6 Shark vacuums because they make a great product. Clean them when needed and use per manufactures recommendations and you will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: sapd

customer_reviews.title: Good Power, love it !
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Good power and it's great not having to lug it around. I used the extension arm from my Hoover vacuum with the crevice tool that comes with the Shark Power Pod to make cleaning even easier.
customer_reviews.author: Marby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love shark products and this one was no exception!
customer_reviews.author: Farm girl

product_meta.title: Shark Power Pod Lift-Around Anti-Allergy Portable Vacuum + Accessories | NP317W
product_meta.description: This Shark Power Pod Lift Around Portable Vacuum makes you look cooler than you already are as you clean your home. As a lightweight and portable vacuum, this thing may be small, but it does mighty big things in your home. It easily gets into crevices, tight spaces, and corners with the flexible hose and the included upholstery brush, crevice tool, and dusting brush. It never loses suction, has an easy to empty dust cup, and a 25 foot power cord so you can maneuver a long ways while cleaning away. The Power Pod is a very low maintenance vacuum with lifetime filters to reduce costs to make you a happy cleaner. For a vacuum that is not only impressive and super lightweight, but gets the job done right and in style, this Shark Power Pod Lift Around Portable Vacuum is the one you want in your cleaning closet.
feature_bullets: Corded, portable hand vacuum for whole house cleaning
Includes an upholstery brush, 6-inch crevice tool, pet brush, and dusting brush
Easily gets into crevices, tight spaces, and corners with flexible hose
Anti Allergy Complete Seal technology fights against dust and othe impurities

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars65 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
